products.description: The EOS R5 C Mirrorless Cinema Camera Kit with RF 24-70mm f/2.8 Lens combines a dual-purpose, full-featured still photo and full-frame cinema camera with a fast, high-quality zoom lens in one package. This pro imaging kit comprises the EOS R5 C mirrorless photo and video cinema camera and the RF 24-70mm f/2.8 L IS USM lens.
